about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to Binaries, the tricky platform game from Ant Workshop. Composed by Will Morton, this soundtrack DLC contains 13 tracks arranged from the game's dynamic soundtrack, as well as the title and trailer music.

All files are in 320kbps MP3 format.

Tracklisting:
  • 01 - Binaries 0111 (Trailer Edit) (1:14)
  • 02 - Binaries 1101 (Trailer Edit) (1:13)
  • 03 - Binaries Title Music (2:33)
  • 04 - Binaries 0001 (3:20)
  • 05 - Binaries 0010 (2:23)
  • 06 - Binaries 0011 (3:25)
  • 07 - Binaries 0100 (3:27)
  • 08 - Binaries 0101 (3:50)
  • 09 - Binaries 0110 (3:15)
  • 10 - Binaries 0111 (2:55)
  • 11 - Binaries 1000 (4:27)
  • 12 - Binaries 1001 (3:33)
  • 13 - Binaries 1010 (2:53)
  • 14 - Binaries 1011 (3:22)
  • 15 - Binaries 1100 (3:44)
  • 16 - Binaries 1101 (3:43)
